title: A Teen Gets Incarcerated for Not Doing Homework | Katie Porter & Danai Gurira
itunes:title: A Teen Gets Incarcerated for Not Doing Homework | Katie Porter & Danai Gurira
description:
Trevor highlights corrupt cops in L.A., Rep. Katie Porter weighs in on reopening schools, and actor Danai Gurira discusses Difficult Conversations with My White Friends.
